Just one technical note, speaking as an electrician, the blue wire is normally the neutral which should not be switched; the switch should be in the brown.  However guessing you will be using a European 2 pin plug it probably does not matter, just good practice :) ............................... nice project though :)

Nice idea, you can get a lever type microswitch, same thing but with a lever, gives you more hysteresis, the one you have will operate with the slightest of movement (vibrations from the wind your movement in the house etc), but the lever type won't. ;)
